title: Giuggianello
description: A fourth to third century B.C. circular tower in masonry built atop a Middle Bronze Age mound.

properties.description: Identified in Google Earth at an eye height of 400m after maps and plans in Mastronuzzi 2018 (imagery dating to 2017 and thereafter; not clearly visible earlier). Dates also after Mastronuzzi.
properties.title: Imagery Location of the Tower of Giuggianello
